```{r partizione training e test}
set.seed(19121984)

training_set <- bank0 %>%
        add_rownames() %>%
        sample_frac(0.8, replace = FALSE)

test_set <- bank0 %>%
        add_rownames() %>%
        sample_frac(1, replace = FALSE) %>%
        anti_join(training_set, by = "rowname")
#check ok, sono diversi
```
